category.name: av.goal
category.item: Hi my name is Tariq, your hotshot pilot. Together we will conquer the skies and see the world! Being your airport's most visible representative, I need to keep up appearances. Get me some smart watches and snazzy ties.
Cool! These ties and watches look top notch. Now I will look as dapper and smart as all the other pilots. That should impress them.

Hello my name is Lin, your stewardess. Keeping passengers happy is essential, a fact that some of my colleagues often ignore - especially that show-off Tariq. Your airport needs brightening up. I think flowers should do the trick.

Thank you! Your airport is looking much brighter and friendlier now. Appearances are very important in this business - investing in decorations will increase your passenger flow. But enough small talk I have paying passengers to charm.

So you're the new kid, huh? The name's Kurt, I keep the planes running. You and I will get along fine, so long as you help me do my job right. We need some serious amounts of greenage to offset our airport's carbon footprint. Go green.
Not bad. You just did your bit for the environment by placing all that lovely greenery. That will make Fiona, our air traffic controller, very happy. She takes this environmental stuff seriously.

If you want us to be respected, I need to become a member of the pilot's club. Should be a breeze - we just have to achieve high volume of plane traffic, and deliver some quality french cheese. If the pilots are impressed they will reward us with the coolest racer plane you've ever seen.

Now we're talking! The pilots were so impressed with how we handled such a high volume of flights that they rewarded us with an exclusive racer plane. You can show this beauty off at other airports and get some nice XP bonuses in the bargain. Awesome.
Visit {number} different airport(s) and collect passengers

Hello again. My passengers have been complaining about your airport - they say travelling to and from the airport is annoyingly slow. My passengers are busy people and don't like waiting around - do something to remedy the situation.

More buses and taxis are just what my passengers ordered! Not to mention, they will increase your passenger flow. The postcards were a nice touch, maybe someday I can take a vacation and meet some friends who will like to get them.

Back already? Great! Can you help us out some more? Fiona's family are visiting the airport and I know she's anxious - not that she'd ever admit it. We need things are running efficiently now more than ever. Make sure to collect a lot of teddy bears to keep the children happy!

Not bad, kid. Fiona's family were impressed by the airport's smooth running. Hm, she looks so pretty when she's happy... What are you staring at? I think she's an impressive air traffic controller, that's all.

Hi! The pilot club rejected my application for membership. They said I lacked experience and maturity - as if! We'll show those elitist windbags. Nothing says experienced and mature like a flashy plane. Let's beat some performance targets to win an exclusive racer plane.

Cool! You won us a racer plane, awesome. We can fly this to all your Buddies and make them envious. Everyone knows that the Gee Bee is a very exclusive plane and something to brag about. That should show those windbags at the pilot club.

Hello. My passengers are happy for now - zero complaints but I wish I could be the same... I am so busy working I never have time to go shopping, and no friends to do it on my behalf. Could you help me collect some essential supplies?
Thank you! I guess this makes us friends... These supplies are essential for keeping me looking fresh faced and elegant, an important part of passenger relations.

Hurry! We have to get cracking! Our airport is heading for bigger things and this requires meeting a whole new set of exacting standards. Gonna be stressful - to keep our stress levels in check pickup some snowglobes. I find them very calming.

Good work, kid. You've raised our game and demonstrated that we can meet exacting standards of service. Maybe you're not as useless as I first thought. I start to see why Fiona talks so highly of you.
Hi! The pilot club might not like me, but maybe the ladies will. Time for a charm offensive, lets try some romantic visits, bearing perfume.
You rock! The ladies loved our charm offensive.

Hello. My passengers are getting tired from all the flying and need a comfortable night's sleep in a tranquil environment. See if you can set that up for me and try and collect some candies to keep them sweet.
Thank you so much! My passengers are much more relaxed after a good night's sleep.
Ready for some cargo crunching? If we run an efficient cargo chain, helping ourselves and our Buddies, then we get a free upgrade to our warehouse capacity. This gain is worth any pain.

Smart move, kid. Running an efficient cargo chain has helped you and your Buddies maximise your profits. This means you get a free upgrade to your warehouse capacity. That's a generous reward - it normally costs AirCash.

Hi! The pilot club have been in touch. They are reconsidering my application. We can't afford to mess this up. I need to prove my maturity and experience with some serious flight stats. The prize is membership of the pilot club and an exclusive racer.

Groovy! The pilot club say your flight statistics prove our maturity and experience. We are in the club! On a provisional basis. That means we get our hands on an exclusive racer, another plane to show-off at your Buddies' airports.

Hello. Your airport is getting big but you need to take care. Passenger numbers are rising and you need to make sure you can handle them all. You should make some large scale improvements to transporation and accomodation.
Thank you so much! My passengers are buzzing about your airport's large-scale improvements. You are heading for the big league

You think everything's running smoothly right? Think again. You have built up an efficient airport but one hiccup could put a spanner in the works. I want you to prove to me that our airport has backups to cope with any emergency.
Nicely done, kid. Our airport has the ability to soak up whatever is thrown at us. I feel you are ready for the bigger challenges that lie ahead.

For us air traffic controllers the airport has become quite big, to keep an overview some streamlining is necessary. Put objects into your storage, place some streets and try to get all those cars away from the airport!
Thank you so much! It's a lot better now. The airport is more streamlined, giving me a much better overview.
You know my friend, there is this stewardess... No-one you know, of course... She remains unimpressed by my feats of piloting. Perhaps some luxury french gifts will do the trick.
Wonderful! There was a twinkle in her eyes, I'm the greatest! Now she recognizes what a great romantic fantastic wonderful.. man and pilot i am.
Our airport needs to raise its fame, put itself on the map. Let's do some marketing and send out some charming flybys!
Great! I was invited into the VIP area at the last 3 airports I visited. We should keep sending those flybys.
Hey, We need a training Ramacopter for several reasons, the service chain isn't working perfect and also groundstaff experiences some problems with the bays.
Not bad! The new Ramacopter helps us train our service chain and improve our work with Ramacopters

A lot of people from other airports are watching us because of our Ramacopter investments. To impress them a bit more we should buy an additional Ramacopter bay. It doesn't look good if Ramacopter passengers have to wait forever until they can leave the Ramacopter or start with boarding.
So nice! Finally the waiting loop for Ramacopters has decreased noticebly. Thanks kido!

Hey, It's me again, Kurt. You know my grandsons they love the airport and they would really like to spend their holiday here next to their hardworking grandpa. But the hotel alone is not enough they want to go hiking. Can't you organize me some of those hiking souvenirs?
Thanks so much, sir! I'm looking foward to showing my proud grandsons the airport and the natural beauty of its surroundings!
We need to keep the pilots club impressed don't we? I would suggest we send out some impressive jets to show them all what we've got.
Good news! It looks like the pilots club are impressed by your fleet, and your ever so humble pilot.
The whole airport is under attack by mosquitos. We need some bug sprays and sun cream for our workers. It's time to invest some money into the airport crew's equipment!
Nice job, the crew is very happy about the investments! Thank you.
It's the finals! We should collect all the fans from the different airports, stuff them into medium passenger planes and fly them to Great Britain! This is going to be the game of the games!
What a great final! The people really enjoyed the game and their stay in England, we should do that next time again!
Send {number} medium plane(s) to Great Britain
Send {number} small plane(s) to Great Britain
Inspectors are on their way! We should train our groundstaff so that we easily pass the inspections with an A++. I'd suggest to service some Ramacopter-Turbo and Rama-XS-Quickie.
Well done, looks very promising now! The inspectors can visit us whenever they want. That's motivating!
Why not enrich the airport with some exotic plants? I'm sure our passengers will appreciate it.
How sweet, the kids love the new cactus. We should keep an eye on decorations and passengers.
There are a lot of airports out there who could send us some cargo, let's put some pressure on our cargo teams so that we can earn a lot more money by selling products.
Haven't I told you - earning money is a nice thing! And the positive side effect of servicing cargo planes are lots of happy and reliable cargo Buddies.
The crew organized some hiking weekends, to improve team morale. Let's help them along with some special supplies!
Great! The crew are super-motivated now. Although they are a bit tired from all the trekking. Luckily the coffee will pick them up.
Hey, It's me again. I know we are quite well-known out there but why not aim higher? Let's decorate our airport with something fantastic and send some flyby planes to raise our visibility.
Cool! The giant cockerel really attracted attention and praise, along with all our friendly flybys. Everybody is buzzing about us!
Unbelievable! There's this new pilot at the club bragging about his Ramacopter-Seaking skills. I'll show him! Let me put in some hours and polish my skills.
Ha! All that extra practice paid off. The new guy saw my skills and quit with his bragging. There's only room for one hotshot loudmouth at the pilot club- and that's me!
I want to see more of the world. After all, variety is the spice of life. Let's fly to countries off the beaten track. I am sure the routes will prove popular.
Wow, thanks!!! The new experience revived my enthusiasm about being a stewardess and flying the world.
Send {number} plane(s) to Bosnia and Herzegovina

Our airport is at risk of looking a bit unfashionable. We need to stay ahead of the decoration trends. Climbing plants are going to be all the rage. Get some planted, and keep an eye on who's falling behind in the decoration stakes.
Not bad, the climbing plants look ultra-fashionable. Just look at all the trendy couples posing in front of them. It's always important to keep up appearances.
Markets are turbulent and investors are getting nervous. Build up a large reserve of money to calm their jittery nerves.
Loads of money! That should calm our investors and keep us flying. Well done!
Fiona always says a real pilot knows the whole world. I know it's much to ask but couldn't you get me some exotic souvenirs? I'm sure that would impress her!
Hurray! Today Fiona held the elevator when she saw me coming! I think your souvenirs really impressed her.
This year several holidays all fall on the coming week! Expect a real stampede of tourists.
All turned out well and we made a lot of coins with those customers.
Hi! I'm Cassandra your new seaplane pilot. There are some really exciting destinations that can only be reached by seaplanes or helicopters. But people would love them I'm sure!
See! It's a little hard to get there but it's definitely worth it!
Can you believe it! The batteries of my Mp3 player are empty after only 3 long distance flights. I can't fly without my music! Please get me new ones.
Great! Where did you manage to find those? I hope it wasn't too much trouble to get them.
Well I heard that our new pilot can fly seaplanes. But can she also handle a helicopter? Let's find out.
Pretty impressive! She landed those helicopters like she grew up in one!
Did you see how that Australian girl landed that seaplane! If I could impress her surely Fiona would get jealous! At least it's worth a try.
I'm not sure if that worked out the way I planned it. I just saw Fiona and the new girl giggling about something in the cafeteria.
I don't like how Cassandra is getting all of Fionas attention these days. I will show her who the best pilot on that airport is!
Well, she might have been quicker than me but you must agree that my flyby had a lot more style!
Great! Now Casandra and Fiona don't talk to me anymore! We'll need something big to change their minds about me.
Ha! That giant bear was just the thing! No girl can resist such a thing.
Cassandra invited me and all the others to visit her in Australia! Fiona will be coming to! I need to look as sharp as possible for that trip.
Ah that was just what I needed! This time there's no way Fiona can ignore me!
We are lacking cargo for the upcoming season. We should get some new stuff and sell out the old wares.
A job well done! We are all set for the next season.
Hey there! I invited some of my pilot colleagues to hop by on their next trip. Of course they will bring some customers with them as well.
Thanks for helping me out. It was nice seeing them again!
Cassandra thinks she's the only one with old friends ha! I will organize a meeting of the best heli pilots out there!
Ha that showed her! Strange that they all seemed to know her a lot better than me though.
I promised Fiona I would lend her my camera for her next trip. The thing is I don't actually have one. Could you get me camera plus batteries?
Thank you! You really are a life saver.
Let's see how quickly we can service the incoming planes with all our new equipment!
Wow! All our staff is impressed by your organization skills!
Why not bring out some of our classic planes for a little airshow. People always like to see those oldies.
See! People loved our airshow! Don't forget your roots with all that fancy new stuff.
My grandchildren are coming for a visit next week. The little ones always love teddies right? Could you get me some?
Thank you. I think your help is the only reason I'm still their favorite grandfather.
Those finance guys come up with a new crisis every month these days. Investors are nervous and want us to save some money for rainy days.
Excellent! That should keep our investors calm.
Hi there! I have to say that all that talking about security made me a little nervous. Imagine the plane gets hit by a meteorite or an UFO! I definitely need one of those multi-tools, just in case.
Thanks you so much! I feel a lot safer already.
I heard Lin is a little scared by all those new security measures. That’s understandable as she is no world class pilot like me. It might help her if I took her on my next flight.
We got in to some turbulences and I’m not sure but from what Lin was telling me I might have blacked out for some minutes. Lin had to bring the bird down all by herself.
I’ll never fly with Tariq again! Even thinking of that horrible flight gives me panic attacks! Could you get me some more safety tools! It would make me feel so much better to have them around.
O thank god! You really got them for me. I’m feeling better already.
I saw in last night X-News how a passenger’s luggage spontaneously caught fire! They say that can happen to any luggage any time when exposed to quick pressure change! I have to be prepared for this!
Thanks for the fire drencher. It just might safe my life one of these days.
We met some potential investors from Japan who showed their interest in our airport. They will show us a visit soon. Let’s welcome them with some old school Japanese decorations. They will love that.
Perfect! Our visitors were pretty impressed of our well cut bonsais. I think they felt quite at home.
We are doing pretty well with our modernization. I think it is time we rewarded ourselves with a nice little holiday. So pack your fishing rod and towel cause were flying to the beach!
Isn’t that one of the finest fishing spots ever! Thanks for making this possible boss.

That Tariq really messed it up this time! Just being close to a planes or passengers terrifies Lin since her trip with him, and she is stewardess! I have to show her that flying is nothing to be afraid of.
It seems that was quite a success. After seeing how smooth we took off Lin was very calm for the whole flight.
This beach here is pretty nice all right, but I heard the waves are currently in other spots. Grab your surf board we’re going for a ride!
This is just great! Did you see me coming out that tunnel, oh man I just love surfing!

It’s a nice fishing spot all right, but somehow those picky fish aren’t biting. The local fisherman say they are using some very rare baits from all kind of faraway places. Could you get me some of those?
Well thanks for the effort. Tonight we’ll be dining grilled fish! You can count on that!

Great! Now everyone knows I can’t swim, thanks to Fiona. She practically forced me in to steep water by doubting my swim skill. At least she dragged me out afterwards. Anyway, get me somewhere far away from here!
That’s better! Those chilly nice mountains! What a sight, and no ocean nor lake anywhere to be seen. Just great!
Help! Please send some of our new fire fighter planes over here real quick! I was supposed to make a little campfire to grill the fish Kurt caught today, but I kind of set the camp on fire instead!
Thanks for saving us! The fish is a little black, and so are our tents but nobody got hurt so I say let bygones be bygones and focus on tomorrow!
Do you think it’s possible that a grown man can’t swim? I find it a little suspicious that Tariq is staying in shallow water all the time. I better keep an eye on him.
Guess I was right. When I confronted him he just shouted at me and ran off. Thank god that you sent those helicopters to look for him.
